# Check for new, updated or deleted data
- This script checks for new, updated or deleted data by checking the source data (vw_protected_characteristics) against the target (odw_harmonised_db.hr_diversity_dim)
- **New Data:** where a Ethnic_Origin in the source does not exist as an Description in the target. NewData flag is set to 'Y'
- **Updated data:** Comparison occurs on Ethnic_Origin in source and Description in target where the row hash is different i.e. there is a change in one of the columns. NewData flag is set to 'Y'
- **Deleted data:** where an Description in the target exists but the same Ethnic_Origin doesn't exist in the source. DeletedData flag is set to 'Y'

## View diversity_dim_new is created

%%sql

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW diversity_grouped

    AS

Select  Ethnic_Origin as Description,
        last(expected_from) AS expected_from

FROM odw_standardised_db.vw_protected_characteristics 
WHERE Ethnic_Origin IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY Ethnic_Origin

%%sql
-- Build diversity_dim table


-- Gets modified or deleted from source rows

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW diversity_dim_new

    AS

-- gets data that matches of SourceID and flags that it is modified based on a row (md5) hash. Flags as "NewData"
-- gets data that is in the target but not in source. Flags as "DeletedData"

SELECT DISTINCT
    CASE
        WHEN T1.Description IS NULL
        THEN T3.DiversityID
        ELSE NULL
    END as DiversityID, -- surrogate key
    T1.Description AS Description,
    T2.SourceSystemID as SourceSystemID, -- NOT CORRECT
    to_timestamp(T1.expected_from) AS IngestionDate,
    NULL AS ValidTo,
    md5(IFNULL(T1.Description, '.')) as RowID,
    'Y' as IsActive,
    T3.IsActive as HistoricIsActive

FROM diversity_grouped T1
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.main_sourcesystem_fact T2 ON "SAP HR" = T2.Description and T2.IsActive = 'Y'
FULL JOIN odw_harmonised_db.hr_diversity_dim T3 ON T1.Description = T3.Description AND T3.IsActive = 'Y'
WHERE  
        -- flags new data        
    (CASE
        WHEN T1.Description = T3.Description AND md5(IFNULL(t1.Description, '.')) <> T3.RowID
        THEN 'Y'
        WHEN T3.Description IS NULL
        THEN 'Y'
        ELSE 'N'
    END  = 'Y')
    AND T1.Description IS NOT NULL
;

select * from diversity_dim_new;

# Dataset is created that contains changed data and corresponding target data
- This script combines data that has been updated, Deleted or is new, with corresponding target data
- View **diversity_dim_new** is unioned to the target data filter to only those rows where changes have been detected
## View diversity_dim_changed_rows is created

%%sql
-- Create new and updated dataset

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY  VIEW diversity_dim_changed_rows

    AS

-- gets updated, deleted and new rows 

Select 
    DiversityID,
    Description, 
    SourceSystemID,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
From diversity_dim_new WHERE HistoricIsActive = 'Y' or HistoricIsActive IS NULL

    UNION ALL

-- gets original versions of updated rows so we can update EndDate and set IsActive flag to 'N'

SELECT
    DiversityID,
    Description,
    SourceSystemID,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
FROM odw_harmonised_db.hr_diversity_dim
WHERE Description IN (SELECT Description FROM diversity_dim_new WHERE DiversityID IS NULL)
AND IsActive = 'Y'

%%sql

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW Loading_month

    AS

SELECT DISTINCT
    IngestionDate AS IngestionDate,
    to_timestamp(date_sub(IngestionDate,1)) AS ClosingDate,
    'Y' AS IsActive

FROM diversity_dim_new;

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW diversity_dim_changed_rows_final

    AS

SELECT 
    DiversityID,
    Description,
    T1.SourceSystemID,
    T1.IngestionDate,
    T1.ValidTo,
    T1.RowID,
    T1.IsActive,
    T2.ClosingDate
FROM diversity_dim_changed_rows T1
FULL JOIN Loading_month T2 ON T1.IsActive = T2.IsActive

# View diversity_dim_changed_rows is used in a merge (Upsert) statement into the target table
- **WHEN MATCHED** ON the Business Key (i.e. Ethnic_Origin from Personal Characteristics), EndDate is set to today -1 day and the IsActive flag is set to 'N'
- **WHEN NOT MATCHED** ON the business key, insert rows
## Table odw_harmonised.diversity_dim is updated

%%sql

-- merge into dim table

MERGE INTO odw_harmonised_db.hr_diversity_dim AS Target
USING diversity_dim_changed_rows_final AS Source

ON Source.DiversityID = Target.DiversityID

-- For Updates existing rows

WHEN MATCHED
    THEN 
    UPDATE SET
    Target.ValidTo = to_timestamp(ClosingDate),
    Target.IsActive = 'N'

        
-- Insert completely new rows
WHEN NOT MATCHED 
    THEN INSERT (DiversityID,
        Description,
        SourceSystemID,
        IngestionDate,
        ValidTo,
        RowID,
        IsActive)  
        VALUES (Source.DiversityID,
        Source.Description,
        Source.SourceSystemID, 
        Source.IngestionDate, 
        Source.ValidTo, 
        Source.RowID, 
        Source.IsActive) ;

# Fix the IDs
- No auto-increment feature is available in delta tables, therefore we need to create new IDs for the inserted rows
- This is done by select the target data and using INSERT OVERWRITE to re-insert the data is a new Row Number
## Table odw_harmonised.diversity_dim is updated

%%sql
-- Insert new DiversityID

INSERT OVERWRITE odw_harmonised_db.hr_diversity_dim

SELECT 
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY DiversityID NULLS LAST) AS DiversityID, 
    Description, 
    SourceSystemID,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
FROM odw_harmonised_db.hr_diversity_dim;
